author: sbberge
title: Cozy and friendly hotell
text:
Me and my girlfriend stayed 4 days in this friendly and romantic hotel in Montmatre. The hotel is very close to many cafes, shops, brasseries, bars and bistros. Walking distance from Sacre CÃ¦ur.
On my birthday, they gave us a gift card for a river boat tour on Seine. The tour was beautiful and highly recommended. The staff spoke good English and was very helpful with travel information and restaurant bookings.
Since the hotell is located very close to Blanche metro stop, it can be a bit noisy. But this is Paris! The aircondition system was somewhat tricky so we had to open the windows. But no big problem.
Decent breakfast buffet. Or try a local cafe just down the street.
I would for sure come back to this hotel.
